titleStmt.title: A sermon vpon part of the prophesie of Obadiah touching the destruction, as of Idum√¶ans, so of Papists; and meanes whereby it must be wrought: preached at Saint Maries in Oxford by Iohn Rainoldes, on the 28. of October last. 1584.
